website_summaries.verdict: A soft, plush towel in natural cotton ideal for younger babies.
pros: Users praise how soft, thick, and cute these towels are
Some also report that they hold up well after washing
It gets top marks for the large hood that keeps baby's head warm after a bath
cons: A few commented that these towels were smaller than others on the market so best for younger babies

customer_reviews.title: So stinking cute!
customer_reviews.text: "It is very cute! I purchased for my grandson to use when he visits. Can't wait!!!"
customer_reviews.author: jobean

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute towel! I absolutely love elephants and thought this was the cutest towel ever. It's very soft and agrees with my baby's skin! We use it at least once a week so it's been washed dozens of time since purchasing and the fabric still looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my one purchase where my heart melts everytime I see it .... This is sooooo adorable and comfy and he's going to love this and grow with this. Great value for money. Only thing left to do is to find a name for it lol
customer_reviews.author: ornella boodhoo

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite towel
customer_reviews.text: This towel is great. A lot of the infant towels that we registered for and purchased for our baby are really thin and, honestly, pretty useless when wrapped around a screaming and writhing wet infant. This towel gets used a lot because its thicker and more comfortable for the baby once he's wrapped in it. He doesn't cry at all when wrapped in this towel. It keeps its shape well when washed and dried as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M. Mader

customer_reviews.title: Baby Boy
customer_reviews.text: For a young female doctor from Kenya who is expecting her first baby (boy), I purchased lots of elephant toys, books, clothes, bibs, and this towel. They were all put in an elephant bag with silver gray paper. She loves the idea of something that reminds her of home. They will have some great play time with the elephant items.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for my new baby
customer_reviews.text: Great towel for my new baby. Wasn't thrilled about all the plastic tags it was packaged up with. I felt like there were too many. Cute little elephant fold up, but I felt like it took forever to just unpack the towel so I could fold it and put it in his drawer (I'm expecting his birth any day now, and until then, his bath stuff is remaining tucked away). That was my only qualm.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Cute Towel
customer_reviews.text: Really like using this towel on my granddaughter after giving her a bath. It’s soft and a good size for a 17 month old. The only drawback is that when I wash the towel and use the dryer, the elephant top piece doesn’t dry completely. Therefore, I hang it up for a few hours so the top portion dries completely.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Supper cute a soft. We use it a lot for our infant when getting out of the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size will be used for newborn. Great shower gift. Good quality . Great addition to baby essentials ,would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, warm,  and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel, super soft, think, and warm. It's perfect for my one year old. My original review was a 3 because the towel started țo fray after 2 washes however, with my original review Sarah contacted me on behalf of the company. She was wonderful to work with and is replacing my towel out of good faith and to ensure a positive outcome for me as a customer. For that experience alone, they've gained a lifetime customer.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson R. Sutera

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little wrap towel and the material is nice and soft unlike others that are super stiff. Can't wait to see my nephew wrapped up in this cute getup!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter-in-law who is expecting a boy in November. It is a gift so I have not opened it. It looks precious. I did Not answer the durability question because it has not been used, but I am sure it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Hill

customer_reviews.title: A great infant towel!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and functional baby towel! Great thickness and softness, and perfect size for my large 8 month old son. Will last a while too!

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small!
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as I hoped and wishes it was longer! It is super cute though!

customer_reviews.title: Product is just like it was described.
customer_reviews.text: This sweet towel, soon will be on its way to Germany. Along with other items.

customer_reviews.title: but it's not the best quality. The plastic pieces holding the folds in ...
customer_reviews.text: The Elephant is cute, but it's not the best quality. The plastic pieces holding the folds in place (I'd not sure what they are called even though I used them all the time in retail) left tiny holes in the fabric and in some spots made the terry cloth fray a bit. Along the seams, I pulled/cut off a lot of loose strings and some more fraying. I'm going to keep it, but I don't expect it to last too long.
customer_reviews.author: PSReviews

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about durability gave it as a gift. Cute towel!

customer_reviews.title: Cute but releases lint
customer_reviews.text: This towel was so cute i had to get it for my son. But when i used it i notice it releases alot of lint everytime i use it. Which is annoying when after drying my son i apply lotion and he is filled with lint .

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I hated to unwrap this adorable little elephant but when I did it was so soft and fluffy. Washed in cold water and dried on delicate setting. I was impressed with how quickly it dried as well on such a low setting. Is there an adult size yet?

customer_reviews.title: Cute elephant bath hoodie

Colors are not bright but do stand out. I would purchase this again as it arrived quickly from the seller.

product_meta.title: Little Tinkers World Hooded Baby Towel Gray Elephant Natural Cotton Soft and Absorbent Bath Towels with Hood for Babies, Toddlers, Perfect for Girls or Boys
feature_bullets: 🐘 PREMIUM 100% COTTON BABY TOWELS WITH HOOD - if you want a soft and durable baby bath towel no need to look any further! Our baby hooded towels feel thicker but not heavy for baby's tender skin. We understand the need for softness that LASTS. This is why we only use quality cotton rather than bamboo alternatives which can be less durable. You can be reassured that our hooded baby towels withstand the test of time.

🐘SUPER THICK AND ABSORBENT HOODED TOWELS FOR BABY – Our luxurious hooded bath towels helps to remove water from your precious ones skin quickly and avoid unnecessary irritation, keeping your newborn baby warm, dry and snuggly after bath, pool or beach time. The perfect addition to your bath time routine.

🐘GENEROUS SIZE – 30x30 inches baby towels for boys and girls, fits from newborn to small toddler/infants. The UNIQUE HOODS with PLAYFUL DESIGNS will make your baby the envy of the group. Featuring cute hood with Elephant face as the hood, with 3D trunk and ears
🐘 MACHINE WASHABLE BABY BATH TOWEL - The towels can easily be machine washed and tumble dried making less work for parents and ensuring that softness and comfort remains wash-after-wash.

🐘 HOODED BABY TOWELS - The best registry or shower gift you can give. Being a family run business we want to ensure 100% satisfaction every time. If you're not happy, we're not happy. If we don't get it right or you're not happy with the product for any reason, we will gladly and promptly refund your purchase price. So what are you waiting for…our cute elephant baby bath towel with hood is the ideal gift for a boy or girl.
